LanguageData.VBE.Cycle.Desc: Cycle background occasionally while in game
LanguageData.VBE.AllowAnimated.Desc: Allow animated backgrounds to be used.
LanguageData.VBE.RimThemes.Desc: Overwrite RimThemes backgrounds with the ones from this mod.
LanguageData.VBE.BetterLoading.Desc: Patch better loading to switch control the background of it's display
LanguageData.VBE.BetterLoading.Move.Desc: Move the better loading progress bar to the bottom to better show the background image
LanguageData.VBE.AnimatedLoad.Desc: Show animations during initial game load. WARNING: In vanilla, these animations will freeze fequently.
LanguageData.VBE.OnLoad.Desc: Show on initial game load. Requires a restart (obviously)
